text: Television City, which is also named CBS Television City, is a television studio in Los Angeles, California. It was built in 1952 by Charles Luckman and William Pereira. They are architects. The television network, CBS make their television programs here. For example, the game show The Price is Right, the soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful, and the situation comedy, All in the Family were all made at CBS Television City. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Los Angeles Category:Television
title: Television City
